changeSet.author: thalabi
changeSet.createView: with latest_date as ( select max(as_of_date) as_of_date from exchange_rate where from_currency='USD' and to_currency='CAD' ), rate_on_latest_date as ( select rate from exchange_rate er join latest_date on er.as_of_date=latest_date.as_of_date and er.from_currency='USD' and er.to_currency='CAD' ), cad_and_usd_values as ( select po.position_snapshot, sum(po.quantity*pr.price) market_value from position po join instrument i on po.instrument_id = i.id join price pr on po.price_id = pr.id where i.currency = 'CAD' group by po.position_snapshot union all select po.position_snapshot, sum(po.quantity*pr.price*(select rate from rate_on_latest_date)) market_value from position po join instrument i on po.instrument_id = i.id join price pr on po.price_id = pr.id where i.currency = 'USD' group by po.position_snapshot ) select row_number() over (order by position_snapshot) id, position_snapshot, sum(market_value) market_value from cad_and_usd_values group by position_snapshot order by position_snapshot
